titles.title: No Political Funds for Personal Use Act
To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to apply the prohibition against the conversion of contributions to personal use to contributions accepted by political committees.
No Political Funds for Personal Use Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary:
No Political Funds for Personal Use Act
Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 with respect to the use of campaign contributions to apply the prohibition against the conversion to personal use of contributions accepted by candidates also to contributions accepted by political committees.
